title: Failed to retrieve current release: Transaction w/ invalid nonce
body:
#### System information

$ geth version
Geth
Version: 1.5.0-unstable
Protocol Versions: [63 62]
Network Id: 1
Go Version: go1.6.2
OS: windows

After receiving this error, geth appeared to stop receiving new blocks and had to be restarted.

I0713 23:56:38.283255 release/release.go:122] Failed to retrieve current release: Transaction w/ invalid nonce. tx=0  state=5)
Please update to latest develop. This should already be fixed.

Thanks for that. Resuming now with:

```
$ git checkout origin/develop
Previous HEAD position was 3af101c... Merge pull request #2763 from karalabe/fix-readme-type
HEAD is now at 2b94d7f... Merge pull request #2782 from karalabe/docker-alpine-master-nogmp

$ godep go install ./...
godep: WARNING: Go version (go1.6) & $GO15VENDOREXPERIMENT= wants to enable the vendor experiment, but disabling because a Godep workspace (Godeps\_workspace) exists

$ geth version
Geth
Version: 1.5.0-unstable
Protocol Versions: [63 62]
Network Id: 1
Go Version: go1.6.2
OS: windows
```
That still is about two weeks old. Please try a `git pull`

Right. Thanks. Now at the correct HEAD:

